item.title: Bitty Engine Available Now
item.description: Bitty Engine is an itty bitty Game Engine, with built-in editors, programmable in Lua. Click for details: https://paladin-t.github.io/bitty/

item.title: Smooth Tile-based Movement Algorithm with Sliding
item.description: Movement is a very basic concept in video games, it could be as simple as accumulating steps to a position value. This article introduces a smooth movement algorithm with tolerant sliding, which offers good adaptivity to various tile-based scenes. Click to read: https://paladin-t.github.io/articles/smooth-tile-based-movement-algorithm-with-sliding.html

item.title: Crapht Box Available Now
item.description: Crapht Box is a Fantasy Physics Sandbox, inspired by the Fantasy Console genre. It brings a simulated world with a number of disks and tools, and leaves you to play, program, create and share disks. Click for details: https://paladin-t.github.io/crft/

item.title: BASIC8 Available Now
item.description: BASIC8 is an integrated Fantasy Computer for game and other program development. You can create, share and play disks in a modern BASIC dialect, with built-in tools for editing sprite, tiles, map, quantized, etc. Click for details: https://paladin-t.github.io/b8/
